translations.name: New International Version
translations.description: Nueva Versión Internacional: In 1979, the International Bible Society embarked on 10-year project to produce a new Spanish-language New Testament in, using the principles that informed the NIV. The translation process sought to preserve the original language while, at the same time, taking into account the specific needs of the Spanish-speaking world.
